entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 06:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: NNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
